support.title: Support
support.contactDescription: If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us at the email address below.
support.responseTime: We typically respond within 2-3 business days.

faq1.question: What can I do with the free plan?
faq1.answer: With the free plan, you can get up to 2 meal suggestions per day. You'll see 2 dish options and have access to the last 3 days of history.

faq2.question: How do I cancel my Premium subscription?
faq2.answer: Go to Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions > mogu on your iPhone. You can continue using the service until the end of your billing period.

faq3.question: Can I customize the meal suggestions?
faq3.answer: Yes! You can select your mood (hearty, light, quick, healthy) and preferred ingredients (meat, fish) to get personalized suggestions.

faq4.question: How do I delete my account?
faq4.answer: Go to Settings in the app and select 'Delete Account'. All your data will be permanently deleted.
